name: Swwarm of Zoblins
conimmunities: poisoned, charmed, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, prone, restrained, stunned
languages: understands the languages it knew in life but can’t speak

traits.name: Undead Swarm Fortitude
traits.desc: The swarm fights at full strength until it is completely destroyed.

traits.name: Swarm
traits.desc: The swarm can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the swarm can move through any opening large enough for a Small goblin. The swarm can't regain hit points or gain temporary hit points.

traits.name: Plagued
traits.desc: When the swarm hits with an attack, it deals an extra 10 (3d6) necrotic damage (included in the attack).

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The swarm uses its pull under ability if able, then uses its gnaw and claw attack.

actions.name: Gnaw and Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 0 ft., one target in the swarm’s space. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) piercing damage plus 10 (3d6) necrotic damage, and the target must succeed a DC 12 Constitution saving throw or become poisoned until the end of their next turn.

actions.name: Pull Under
actions.desc: The swarm attempts to envelope a creature within its space. The target must succeed on a DC 12 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone and considered grappled (escape DC 12) as they are pinned to the ground under a sea of zombies. This ability can only be used if the swarm is above half of its maximum hit points.
